#sidebar TableOfContents

= Introduction =

A [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-mosaic/source/browse/trunk/src/org/gwt/mosaic2g/client/scene/Control.java Control] feature has a visual representation. You can think about it as a GWT Widget wrapper.

= Details =

The basic set of controls are:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-mosaic/source/browse/trunk/src/org/gwt/mosaic2g/client/scene/control/Box.java Box]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-mosaic/source/browse/trunk/src/org/gwt/mosaic2g/client/scene/control/Text.java Text]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-mosaic/source/browse/trunk/src/org/gwt/mosaic2g/client/scene/control/Image.java Image]
  * ImageSequence (TODO)
